about_the_game:
Overcome your past and become someone new. A game about love, loss and being lost in life.



In an attempt to get away from the past, Rin arrives in an unfamiliar city to start their new life and position at the secretive company Truer than You, specializing in renting out actors for real-life situations.



Take Rin through their gigs without breaking the company rules or becoming exposed. Navigate situations by making choices and having conversations to get a good rating. According to the rules, you cannot have relationships with clients. But what if you take a liking to someone?



In the end, is escaping from yourself really possible? Or could playing someone else bring you closer to who you are?



💎 Explore relationships and dilemmas connected to authenticity and roles in society

💎 Form deeper relationships with three different characters and reveal their back stories

💎 Queer-friendly cast of characters and relationship types

💎 Choose from more than 1,100 options leading to multiple endings

💎 Flowing conversation mechanic - decide when to speak (or not)
